author: Minyvonne Burke
title: 'This is a good day,' NYC mayor says of decline in hospitalizations and ICU patients
description: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio shared a bit of good news Thursday, saying the number of people with the coronavirus admitted to hospitals and the total number in intensive care have both declined.
content:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio shared a bit of good news Thursday, saying the number of people with the coronavirus admitted to hospitals and the total number in intensive care have both declined. 
The mayor said the latest daily report shows 227 new hos… [+6873 chars]
